DOC.brief_summary: Focus of this study was to determine if bupropion was more effective for smoking cessation when used alone or combined with nicotine gum.
DOC.brief_title: Bupropion Alone or Combined With Nicotine Gum
DOC.criteria: Smoke 10 or more cigarettes per day Motivated to quit No physical or mental health issues that would prevent participation Not pregnant or willing to prevent pregnancy during treatment Carbon monoxide (CO) breath test score below 10 parts per million (ppm) Center for Epidemiologic Studies Depression Scale (CESD) score greater than 16 Heavy alcohol use History of eating disorder Suicidality
